Sentencas: A consideration of the economic viability of hydrogen fuel production is important in the STEP (Solar Thermal Electrochemical Photo) production of hydrogen fuel.
Titulo: Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment

Sentencas: STEP is an innovative way to decrease costs and increase the efficiency of hydrogen fuel production, which is a synergistic process that can use concentrating photovoltaics (CPV) and solar thermal energy to drive a high temperature, low voltage, electrolysis (water-splitting), resulting in H-2 at decreased energy and higher solar efficiency.
Titulo: Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment

Sentencas: This study provides evidence that the STEP system is an economically viable solution for the production of hydrogen.
Titulo: Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment

Sentencas: STEP occurs at both higher electrolysis and solar conversion efficiencies than conventional room temperature photovoltaic (PV) generation of hydrogen.
Titulo: Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment

Sentencas: This paper probes the economic viability of this process, by comparing four different systems: (1) 10% or (2) 14% flat plate PV driven aqueous alkaline electrolysis H2 production, (3) 25% CPV driven molten electrolysis H2 production, and (4) 35% CPV driven solid oxide electrolysis H2 production.
Titulo: Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment

Sentencas: The molten and solid oxide electrolysers are high temperature systems that can make use of light, normally discarded, for heating.
Titulo: Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment
Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment

Sentencas: Using levelized cost analysis, this study shows significant cost reduction using the STEP system.
Titulo: Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment

Sentencas: The total price per kg of hydrogen is shown to decrease from $5.74 to $4.96 to $3.01 to $2.61 with the four alternative systems.
Titulo: Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment

Sentencas: The advanced STEP plant requires less than one seventh of the land area of the 10% flat cell plant.
Titulo: Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment

Sentencas: To generate the 216 million kg H-2/year required by 1 million fuel cell vehicles, the 35% CPV driven solid oxide electrolysis requires a plant only 9.6 mi(2) in area.
Titulo: Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment

Sentencas: While PV and electrolysis components dominate the cost of conventional PV generated hydrogen, they do not dominate the cost of the STEP-generated hydrogen.
Titulo: Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment

Sentencas: The lower cost of STEP hydrogen is driven by residual distribution and gate costs.
Titulo: Efficient STEP (solar thermal electrochemical photo) production of hydrogen - an economic assessment
